Jquery Slim version 3.4.1 -- Javascript library
Pygments -- Syntax highlighter (optional)
Python-Markdown -- The markdown interpreter
$ABOW_CONFIG, if defined
$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/abow/config, defaulting to ~/.config/abow/config
Optional: If you want syntax highlighting when displaying code in your page, install the extra:
trans-unit.target: 可选：如果要在页面中显示代码时突出显示语法，请安装以下内容：

trans-unit.source: Make sure the access is restricted. A Bottle of Wiki has no concept of login or user, so anyone with access can edit the pages. You can limit the access by setting up HTTP authentication and encryption on your web server. You can also serve only on a local network and access it via a VPN.
trans-unit.target: 确保访问受到限制。维基瓶没有登录或用户的概念，因此具有访问权限的任何人都可以编辑页面。您可以通过在Web服务器上设置HTTP身份验证和加密来限制访问。您还可以仅在本地网络上服务，并通过VPN访问它。

trans-unit.source: A Bottle of Wiki
A Bottle of Wiki (abbreviated abow) is a personal wiki. Use it for viewing and editing pages written in markdown directly your browser. It is made to be usable both on mobile and desktop.
trans-unit.target: 维基瓶（缩写abow）是个人Wiki。使用它可以直接在浏览器中查看和编辑以markdown编写的页面。它可以在移动设备和台式机上使用。

trans-unit.source: A Bottle of Wiki can be customized with a .ini configuration file. A example is provided in the source distribution, or you can generate it with the following command:
trans-unit.target: 一个Wiki瓶可以用一个.ini配置文件来定制。在源码发行版中提供了一个例子,或者你可以用下面的命令生成它。

trans-unit.source: A Bottle of Wiki depends on the following python packages:

A Bottle of Wiki is a WSGI application, as such it can be hosted by any WSGI-capable web server. The documentation of bottle has a page dedicated to the deployment that can be used as inspiration. Detailing how to host a WSGI application is beyond the scope of this README as there are many options to choose from, but here is the most important piece of advice:
trans-unit.target: Wiki瓶是WSGI应用程序，因此可以由任何支持WSGI的Web服务器托管。bottle的文档中有一个专门用于部署的页面 ，可以作为启发。由于有许多选项可供选择，因此详细介绍如何托管WSGI应用程序超出了本自述文件的范围，但这是最重要的建议：

trans-unit.source: A Bottle of Wiki is a wiki built with bottle.
A Bottle of Wiki — personal wiki
Built With
Configuration
Deployment (the whole bottle)
Detection of edit conflict
Finally start the application with:

If all went well, you can point your browser to http://127.0.0.1:8080/ and start editing. The pages will be saved in the current directory. If you are looking for inspiration, a few markdown pages (including this README) are part of the source distribution.
trans-unit.target: 如果一切顺利，您可以将浏览器指向http://127.0.0.1:8080/并开始编辑。页面将保存在当前目录中。如果您正在寻找灵感，那么一些markdown页面（包括本README）是源代码分发的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Installation
License
Or use your favorite virtualenv management tool.
trans-unit.target: 或者使用你喜欢的virtualenv管理工具。

trans-unit.source: Page history
Paths are tried one after one and each configuration file can override the settings of the previous ones.
trans-unit.target: 路径一个接一个地试,每个配置文件都可以覆盖前面的设置。

trans-unit.source: Right now if you edit a page from two browsers you can lose some modifications. Detecting that the page has been changed on the server while being edited would be nice if you want to use a Bottle of Wiki with more than one user.
trans-unit.target: 现在,如果你在两个浏览器中编辑一个页面,你可能会失去一些修改。如果你想和多个用户一起使用瓶装Wiki,那么检测到页面在服务器上被修改会很好。

trans-unit.source: Test (a quick sip)
The configuration is read from the following locations:
trans-unit.target: 配置是从以下位置读取的。

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to test a Bottle of Wiki is to install it in a virtual environment. You can do so with the following commands:
trans-unit.target: 测试一瓶Wiki的最简单的方法是在虚拟环境中安装它。你可以通过以下命令来实现。

trans-unit.source: The example configuration is heavily commented and should be self-explanatory. It enable you to change where a Bottle of Wiki stores the pages and the locale used. You can also host the static assets (css, js, ...) outside of the application and serve them directly from a web server.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子的配置有很多注释,应该是不言自明的。它可以让你改变一瓶Wiki存储页面的位置和使用的语言。你也可以将静态资产(css,js,...)托管在应用程序之外,并直接从Web服务器上为它们服务。

trans-unit.source: The following css and javascript packages are included:
Then install a Bottle of Wiki and its dependencies with pip:
trans-unit.target: 然后用pip安装一个Wiki的瓶子和它的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Things to do
This project is licensed under the Affero General Public License version 3 or later.
trans-unit.target: 本项目采用Affero通用公共许可证3或更高版本授权。

trans-unit.source: To run a Bottle of Wiki, you will need python3 installed on a unix-like machine.
trans-unit.target: 要运行一瓶Wiki,你需要在类似unix的机器上安装python3。

trans-unit.source: While you can avoid losing changes by setting up a backup on the server (and you should anyway), integrating the page history in the wiki would make is easier to review the page modifications. Look into dulwich for that?
trans-unit.target: 尽管您可以通过在服务器上设置备份来避免丢失更改（无论如何还是应该这样做），但是将页面历史记录集成到Wiki中将使查看页面修改变得更加容易。为此寻找德威？

trans-unit.source: While you won't be hosting Wikipedia on a Bottle of Wiki, it is easy to deploy and does not require a database: pages are saved as text files. It has no notion of users, access rights, page history, comments, discussion or even edit conflict. It is meant to be used by one person.
trans-unit.target: 虽然你不会在瓶装Wiki上托管维基百科,但它很容易部署,而且不需要数据库:页面被保存为文本文件。它没有用户、访问权限、页面历史、评论、讨论甚至编辑冲突的概念。它只适合一个人使用。
